entry.name: attributeNotEqual
entry.title: Attribute Not Equal Selector [name!="value"]

argument.name: value
argument.desc: An attribute value. Can be either an unquoted single word or a quoted string.

entry.desc: Select elements that either don't have the specified attribute, or do have the specified attribute but not with a certain value.

example.desc: Finds all inputs that don't have the name 'newsletter' and appends text to the span next to it.
example.html:
name is newsletter
no name
name is accept
